name: Palazzo Velabro
description: Attractively situated in Rome, Palazzo Velabro features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchen equipped with a fridge. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Guests at Palazzo Velabro will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rome, like cycling. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roman Forum, Palazzo Venezia and Piazza Venezia. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 14 km from Palazzo Velabro.

name: Alloggi Costantini
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a washer/dryer, as well as an ironing board and soundproofing. Other amenities include a dining area, a desk, a laptop-friendly workspace, and a wardrobe or closet.Expedia

name: Cinemovie
address: 175 Via Nomentana primo piano Interno 5, 00161 Rome
description: No description found

name: La Casa di Nazareth
description: No description found

name: The First Musica
description: Situated in Rome and with Piazza Navona reachable within 1.1 km, The First Musica features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The First Musica provides some rooms with city views, and rooms have a coffee machine. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. At The First Musica you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Pizza and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Castel Sant'Angelo, Lepanto Metro Station and Piazza del Popolo. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 16 km from The First Musica, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ibis Styles Roma Aurelia
description: The ibis Styles Roma Aurelia is new: inaugurated in April 2022, it offers solutions for all types of travelers. Our hotel is located a few steps from the Via Aurelia, a few kilometers from the major attractions of Rome and 20 minutes from Fiumicino Airport. Enjoy the spacious lobby. An open and dynamic space, designed both for work, with comfortable tables and chairs, and for fun and relaxation.accorhotels.com

name: The Pantheon Iconic Rome Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Discover modern luxury at The Pantheon Iconic Rome Hotel, Autograph Collection. We're just moments from some of Italy's most legendary destinations, like the Pantheon, Piazza Navona, Campo de’ Fiori, the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. Within our boutique hotel, you'll find artwork and modern design reminiscent of Rome's golden age, from our lobby to our modern rooms and suites. Unwind amidst bespoke amenities in your boutique hotel room, each with a private wine cellar, a pillow menu and more. The elegant, inviting atmosphere of our boutique hotel is carried into our sixth-floor terrace restaurant and lounge, where delectable fare and craft cocktails are complemented by stunning views of the Roman cityscape. Our Michelin Starred, Idylio by Apreda, offers a modern blend of Mediterranean and Oriental flavors from renowned Chef Francesco Apreda. No matter your reason for visiting Italy, The Pantheon Iconic Rome Hotel Autograph Collection sets the stage for a 5-star experience.Marriott

name: Hotel Amalfi
description: Overlooking Rome's Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica, Hotel Amalfi offers air-conditioned rooms, an extensive buffet breakfast, and free WiFi throughout. Termini Station is 600 metres away. Rooms at the historical Amalfi Hotel include frescoed ceilings, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has a hairdryer. The sweet and savoury breakfast includes scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, fresh pastries, and hot drinks. The helpful staff at the hotel Amalfi’s 24-hour reception can offer advice on excursions. The Coliseum is a 15-minute walk away. Cavour and Vittorio Emanuele Metro stops are both within 500 metres of the property.

name: Comics Guesthouse
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a high-definition TV, as well as a coffee/tea maker and climate control. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an ironing board.Expedia

name: Hotel Monte Cenci
description: A 10-minute walk from both the Pantheon and Piazza Navona in the centre of Rome, Hotel Monte Cenci boasts a rooftop terrace, bar and stylish rooms with air conditioning and parquet floors. WiFi is free throughout. The spacious rooms come with an elegant décor, a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. An extensive sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is prepared daily, served on the terrace in fine weather, and gluten-free options are also available. It includes eggs, omelettes, pastries, cheese and cold cuts. Campo de' Fiori is 500 metres from Hotel Monte Cenci, while the lively area of Trastevere is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Ateneo Garden Palace
description: Situated under a 20-minute walk from Termini Metro Station, Ateneo Garden Palace Hotel provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Rome. It provides stylish rooms with private balconies overlooking the courtyard. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including an express check-in and check-out feature, an executive floor and 24-hour room service. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The rooms at Ateneo Garden Palace Hotel have a shared terrace, a mini bar and a hydro-massage bathtub. They all come with an en suite bathroom which includes a rain shower. Those staying at Ateneo Garden Palace Hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. Each evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The hotel is conveniently set in the Latium Wine Region, making it easy for guests to experience the region's specialities. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Roma Termini Railway Station, which allows easy access in and around Rome.Revato

name: Starhotels Michelangelo
address: Via Della Stazione Di San Pietro 14, 00165 Rome
description: Situated a short stroll from Ottaviano - San Pietro - Musei Vaticani Metro Station, Starhotels Michelangelo Rome provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Rome. This peaceful hotel is an ideal choice for exploring local vineyards as it is located in the Latium Wine Region. Starhotels Michelangelo Rome has recently been refurbished and offers free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and 24-hour room service. Airport transfers, a laundry service and a dry cleaning service are available upon enquiry. After a day of discovering the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They feature an in-room safe, a mini bar and a telephone. The on-site restaurant serves Italian, local and international dishes in a sophisticated setting. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Starhotels Michelangelo Rome is close to Vatican Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Rome and its surrounding areas. The hotel is also close to the area's popular nightlife destinations, and Institute for the Works of Religion, Via della Conciliazione and the Vatican Museums are a 20-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Hotel San Giovanni Roma
description: Featuring a bar, Hotel San Giovanni Roma is located in Rome in the Lazio region, 1 km from San Giovanni Metro Station and 1.4 km from Ponte Lungo Metro Station. With a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Guest rooms at Hotel San Giovanni Roma are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Italian breakfast. Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Domus Aurea is 1.8 km from Hotel San Giovanni Roma, while Vittorio Emanuele Metro Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Aparthotel Colombo Roma
description: Set in Garbatella, Aparthotel Colombo Roma offers studios and suites with Sky TV and free fibre-optic WiFi access. Public buses for the city centre stop nearby. The accommodation is soundproofed and air conditioned. The residence also offers on-site laundry facilities. A bus stop 200 metres away has services to Piazza Venezia and Piazza Navona. Garbatella Metro and the Eataly food hall are both 15 minutes’ walk from the property.

name: Serena Hotel
description: Hotel Serena is set within walking distance of Termini Railway Station, which is just around the corner. The area offers many typical restaurants. The friendly staff of Hotel Serena can provide information about Rome, city tours, or private shuttles to various landmarks (at extra costs). Each room of the Serena reflects the elegance and style of the hotel. A continental buffet breakfast is served daily in the bar (07:30 - 10:00). Coliseum is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Serena.

name: The First Roma Arte
description: This 5-star boutique hotel is in Rome's historic centre an 8-minute walk from the Spanish Steps. It offers a panoramic rooftop terrace, 24-hour personal assistance and room service and elegant rooms with free WiFi. The First Roma is a member of LVX Collection of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. It is a 2-minute walk from Richard Meyer Ara Pacis Museum, a 5-minute walk from Flaminio Metro Station and 750 metres from the Spanish Steps. Exclusive boutique shops on Via Condotti are 550 metres from the property. Rooms at The First Roma feature contemporary works of art and modern furniture. Each comes with iPod docks, soft bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some suites boast a terrace with hot tub. Guests can enjoy seafood at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant as well as the rooftop Acquaroof restaurant. A lobby bar and a free fitness area are also available on site.

name: Hotel Locarno
description: Hôtel Locarno, housed in early 20th-century twin buildings, is well located on a charming little street just off of Piazza del Popolo, features a rooftop terrace overlooking Rome's historic centre. Offering free bikes and free Wi-Fi, this property has rooms with an Art Nouveau style. Guest rooms interiors were carefully restored and reimagined in a retro-classic style, combining Art Deco furniture and fixtures with a dash of urban hipness. Hôtel Locarno has an unbreakable bond with the world of art and culture. In fine weather, a generous continental breakfast is served al fresco on the furnished patio. In the afternoon and evening you can also enjoy a drink at the Locarno's bar, also open to the public. Intimate private salons and rooftop terraces offer venues for a variety of events from meetings and business lunches to cocktail receptions and gala dinners. All air conditioned, en suite rooms at the Locarno Hotel come with fine fabrics, a TV, safe and minibar. A 4-minute walk away, Flaminio Metro Station offers direct connections to the Vatican City area and Termini Train Station. The Spanish Steps are 850 metres from the Locarno.

name: Bio Hotel Raphaël
description: One street from Piazza Navona, Hotel Raphael offers luxurious rooms with marble bathroom and parquet floors. Its roof terrace boasts panoramic views of Rome, from St. Peter's to the Pantheon. All air-conditioned rooms come with flat-screen satellite TV and free wired internet. Each elegant bathroom features a bathrobe, slippers, and courtesy set by Bulgari. Some rooms were designed by architect Richard Meier and include an entertainment system by Bose. The 5-star Bio Hotel Raphael - Relais & Châteaux serves an abundant continental breakfast every morning. Guests can also dine at the Mater Terrae restaurant. The Raphael Hotel is well connected by buses and most of Rome's historic attractions are just a short walk away. You can reach the Pantheon in 5 minutes on foot, while Castel Sant'Angelo is only 700 metres away.

name: The First Roma Dolce
description: Situated in Rome and with Piazza del Popolo reachable within 400 metres, The First Dolce - Preferred Hotels & Resorts features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some rooms at the hotel also boast a city view. An American breakfast is available each morning at The First Dolce - Preferred Hotels & Resorts. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Villa Borghese, Trevi Fountain and Spagna Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 18 km from The First Dolce - Preferred Hotels & Resorts.

name: Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel
description: The Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel is located on the first and third floor of a building and on the second floor of an annex dependace in the historic center of Rome 350 meters from the Spanish Steps. Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel boasts 2 terraces it features elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Air-conditioned rooms at the Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel are fully equipped and feature a satellite flat-screen TV with Sky channels, minibar, coffee machine and safe. The private bathroom includes a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. A rich sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is served daily, and can be enjoyed daily on the terrace in fine weather. The popular shopping street of Via del Corso is 200 metres away, while the Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon are both less than a 10-minute walk away. Spagna Metro Station, with links to the Vatican and Termini Train Station, is 500 metres away.

name: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano
description: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano is a hidden oasis in the heart of bustling Rome. Situated right beside the River Tiber and close to all that the city has to offer including St Peter's Basilica, Sant'Angelo Bridge, Sant'Angelo Castle and the Trastevere neighborhood. Luxurious designer boutiques and fine dining are only steps away. Marvel at the wonders of Vatican City which is found within walking distance. If you are driving, there is an on-site garage. NH Collection Roma Giustiniano has 161 rooms, all finished in a modern, minimalist style and featuring hardwood floors. Some of the rooms look out over the historic landmarks of Rome. Enjoy a fragrant Italian espresso with a Lavazza machine in each room. For relaxation, we have a pillow menu, rain-effect shower and soundproofing, and to stay connected there is free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. For breakfast, you will be delighted with local dishes and a variety of cold and hot plates, including gluten-free options and children’s breakfast. Lunch and dinner are served at Zenzero & Cannella, and for a relaxing drink head to the stylish bar. 8 meeting rooms are available at the hotel.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Gregoriana
description: Just a 2-minute walk from the Spanish Steps, Hotel Gregoriana offers modern accommodation in the Spagna district of Rome. The property is 500 metres from the Trevi Fountain and the Barberini Palace. The air-conditioned rooms come with free Wi-Fi, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is served daily in the dining room. Hotel Gregoriana is 300 metres from Spagna Metro stop which takes you to St. Peter’s Square and Roma Termini Train Station.

name: Hotel The Brand
description: The Brand is a modern building set in a green, peaceful suburb of Rome, close to the A90 motorway access. The hotel offers free parking but the garage is subject to charges 10 euro per day. A public bus, running every 30 minutes, takes you to the Baldo Degli Ubaldi Metro Station (line A). The Brand has a reading room, TV lounge, and large, private gardens. Rooms at The Brand are bright and come with air conditioning.

name: Hotel Gioberti
description: Hotel Gioberti is located on the namesake main road, 100 metres from Termini Railway Station and 300 metres from the Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore. Enjoy comfortable rooms and a rich breakfast. The Hotel Gioberti is located in a restored 19th-Century building and is conveniently linked to the main tourist, shopping and business areas. Walk to the Termini Metro Station and bus stop, and the whole city and surroundings will be yours. All rooms at Hotel Gioberti are spacious, soundproofed, and elegantly furnished. The buffet breakfast includes a selection of sweet and savoury food, cereals, yoghurt, and hot and cold drinks. Special requests, including gluten-free products, can also be arranged. Staff are available 24/7 to assist guests with anything they need during their stay.

name: Hotel Cortina
description: The 3-star Cortina Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Rome. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Cortina Hotel. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, air conditioning, heating, desk, mini bar. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Cortina Hotel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Bettoja Hotel Atlantico
description: The Hotel Atlantico a 1935 building is built on the highest of romes seven hills the Esquilino. Thanks to its central position it allows you to quickly reach the main points of interest and many touristic sites like the Colosseum, Imperial Forum, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. The direct train to the airport is only a short walk from the hotel also making the hotel ideal for those who come to Rome by train or by air.iHotelier/iStay

name: Damaso Hotel
description: Centrally set in Rome, Hotel Damaso is 150 metres from Piazza Navona and a 2-minute walk from Campo de' Fiori. It features a panoramic terrace, a lounge bar and air-conditioned rooms located in a historic building from the 19th century. WiFi is free. All the rooms at 3-star Damaso offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each private marble bathroom provides a free toiletries, bathrobes and slippers. A generous buffet breakfast is available daily. It includes sweets and savoury options together with hot drinks. Dietary conditions can be catered for on request. The Dama lounge bar is open every evening. Piazza Venezia, with links to Termini Train Station by bus number 64, is 800 metres away. The Vatican is reachable on foot in 20 minutes.

name: The Rome Edition
address: Salita di San Nicola da Tolentino 14, 00187 Rome
description: The Rome EDITION offers uniquely designed food and beverage outlets, including a signature restaurant with outdoor dining space that will make locals and visitors fall in love with its cuisine and all that comes with it, a Punch Room bar with exceptionally crafted cocktails; and a Rooftop Terrace where guests can have the choice of a seasonal bite, a drink overlooking the city, a private gathering with friends, or all of the above. In addition to customizable indoor and outdoor event spaces, the hotel is also home to a rooftop swimming pool, a very spacious hi tech gym, and two treatment rooms including a couple-massage experience. At the corner of modern luxury and history, the hotel is housed within a historical striking building designed by Cesare Pascoletti in collaboration with architect Marcello Piacentini, one of Italy’s most famed architects of Rationalism in the early 20th century.Marriott

name: Hotel Isa
description: The Isa is a modern boutique hotel, completely non smoking. Located in the exclusive Prati district of Rome, it is a 15-minute walk from the Vatican along the banks of River Tiber. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi. Hotel Isa features elegant lounge areas, and breakfast is served on the panoramic rooftop terrace. Rooms are all air-conditioned and come with slippers and hairdryer. Each room and each floor features a different design and decor. The Pantheon and picturesque Piazza Navona are a short walk away, just across the river.

name: Hotel Miami
description: Hotel Miami is set in the Repubblica area of Rome, 10 minutes' walk from the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. Rooms are air-conditioned and have a satellite TV. Breakfast includes cappuccino, croissants, cheese and ham. The Miami's rooms are decorated in an elegant style with classic wooden furnishings, and tiled or carpeted floors. Each room has a satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can book excursions and tickets for your stay in Rome. Repubblica Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the Miami Hotel, for direct links to the Vatican. Termini Train Station is 500 metres away for buses and trains to Fiumicino Airport.

name: Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
description: Perched on 15-acres of private Mediterranean parkland overlooking the Eternal City and the Vatican, the Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel offers 345 spacious guestrooms, 25 finely appointed Suites and the exclusive Imperial Club lounge. Dine at La Pergola, Rome’s first and only 3-star Michelin restaurant: peruse Europe's most prestigious private art collection, including an astonishing Tiepolo triptych and the 'Dollar Sign' series by Andy Warhol: or relax in the Rome Cavalieri Club, Rome’s most luxurious spa and fitness haven with one indoor and three beautiful outdoor pools. Completed by a large congress center able to accommodate up to 5,500 delegates, this luxury hotel is the only resort retreat in in the Eternal City, and brings new purpose to the fine art of exclusive hospitality.Hilton

name: Mercure Roma Centro Termini
description: Ideally set in the Rione Monti district of Rome, Mercure Roma Centro Termini is situated 500 metres from Quirinal Hill, 600 metres from Piazza Barberini and 600 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore. The property has a snack bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Mercure Roma Centro Termini can enjoy a continental breakfast. Trevi Fountain is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Piazza Venezia is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 14 km from Mercure Roma Centro Termini, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Fifteen Keys Hotel
description: Centrally located in the Monti district of Rome, The Fifteen Keys Hotel is a 4-minute walk from Cavour Metro Station. It offers a garden, terrace and air-conditioned rooms featuring free WiFi. Each elegant room at the 4-star Fifteen Keys will provide you with a 40-inch LCD TV with satellite channels, minibar and an electric kettle. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and Malin+Goetz toiletries. Termini Train Station is 1 metro stop from the property. The Coliseum is reachable on foot in 10 minutes.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti
description: Find yourself in a centrally located hotel in Rome when you make DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti your place to stay during your visit. The flair of Rome and all of its cultural, historical and town hotspots are conveniently near our hotel. For families, our hotel has kid-friendly amenities that will make the trip easier. Our separate convention center entrance and 3 meeting rooms also make us a great host to medium-sized events and ceremonies in Rome. When you arrive at our hotel, admire the view of the skylight and peristylium inspired design. We will greet you with our warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon check-in. Unwind in one of our guest rooms featuring complimentary WiFi, minibar, coffee and tea-making facilities as well as other amenities to enhance your stay. Upgrade your room for more space, an espresso machine and more bathroom amenities, or upgrade to a suite for a separate living area. Fine dining and a great atmosphere are not far away with our main restaurant on the ground floor. It offers international cuisine for breakfast and dinner and also features a show cooking window. DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti is the place to be when you come to visit Rome.Hilton

name: Mama Shelter Roma
description: Mama Shelter Roma is your home away from home in the heart of Rome. Our neighbourhood hotel is nested a few steps away from the Vatican treasures. Whether you are here for work or play, local or just passing through the capital, Mama Roma will look afteryou. With cutting edge design elements, Mama Shelter Roma houses 217 bedrooms. With several private atelier style meeting rooms, bars and restaurants, a rooftop with a solarium, outdoor Garden Bar and a pool, Mama Roma will both spoil and inspire you.accorhotels.com

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Principessa Isabella
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Principessa Isabella in Rome, Italy offers easy access to some of the most famous attractions in the Capital City, including Vatican City and the Olympic Stadium, and its very close to the famous park Villa Borghese. This Rome, IT hotel is also close to the American Embassy and Piazza di Spagna. Comfortable interior corridors offer easy and safe room access, while the bar is a great place to unwind and grab a drink. A free full breakfast is available to all guests, as well as a free daily newspaper. All guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with cable, mini-bar and desk. Some rooms feature a sofa sleeper and whirlpool. This is a pet-friendly hotel, where four-legged friends are allowed to stay for a small fee. Its perfect location and convenient access to area attractions make the Clarion Collection Hotel Principessa Isabella a great place for business and leisure travelers in the Rome, Italy area. Book a room with us today, we look forward to your stay.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Alpi
description: Boasting a spacious rooftop terrace, Hotel Alpi is an Art-Nouveau style property 5 minutes' walk from Termini Train Station. Castro Pretorio Metro Station is only 300 metres from the hotel. All rooms at the Alpi Hotel are individually decorated, in either a classic or modern design. Rooms feature a kettle and an interactive flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi. Breakfast is served in the dedicated room and guests can enjoy the use of a shared Illy coffe machine. Breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace on request. The Alpi has been owned by the same family since 1963, and the professional staff provide a personalised service. The Coliseum is only 2 metro stops, on line B, from Termini Station.

name: Hotel Vilòn
description: Steps from Rome’s famous Spanish ones, Hotel Vilòn is an elegant, art-filled boutique retreat in the shadow of the Palazzo Borghese. Esteemed neighbours aside, this former boarding school has been transformed into a small-scale hotel with just 18 rooms. Several of them overlook the Palazzo’s secret gardens; nab one with a furnished terrace suspended over them. The all-day bar extends out to the courtyard in fine weather, and you don’t have to wait for the bell to ring for the fun to start (first orders are taken at 10.30am). Don’t be fooled by the bistro’s Adelaide moniker: there’s nothing Antipodean about this seasonal Roman fare.Mr & Mrs Smith

name: Hotel Artis
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Cinecittà Film Studios and 10 minutes' walk from Alessandrino Metro on line C, Hotel Artis is set in a residential area, 9 km from Rome city centre. This hotel offers free parking, free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. The Artis features air-conditioned rooms with an LCD TV, satellite channels and a minibar. The en suite marble bathrooms feature a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is available. The on-site restaurant specialises in Italian and Roman cuisine. Rome Termini Station can be reached from the Subaugusta and Cinecittà Metro Stations in about 15 minutes.

name: The Inn at the Spanish Steps
description: The Inn is a luxurious residence set in a historic building on Via Condotti, Rome's most famous shopping street, near Piazza di Spagna. Breakfast, if included in the rate, is served in the Reception's Building. All rooms at The Inn at the Spanish Steps feature air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Slippers, bathrobes and toiletries are provided in each of the private bathrooms. Some rooms and suites have a French balcony with views of Piazza di Spagna and Via Condotti. Some rooms and suites are located in the main building, while some are set in the annex. Luxury apartments are all set in a separate building only 300 metres away. Friendly and efficient staff can arrange limousine services and sightseeing tours. An escalator and moving side-walk system leads directly from the nearby Spagna Metro Station on line A, to the famous Villa Borghese park.

name: Albergo Abruzzi
description: Only 20 metres from the Pantheon, Albergo Abruzzi is set in the Piazza della Rotonda square, in the historic centre of Rome. Guests will receive a smartphone with free calls and internet access. With free Wi-Fi, elegant rooms at Abruzzi Albergo have a minibar, an electric kettle and parquet floors. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms overlook the Pantheon. The property offers air-conditioned accommodation with a satellite flat-screen TV. An American buffet breakfast is provided daily. It is served in a local restaurant in the square. The hotel’s staff can provide you with helpful tips and tourist information. Piazza Navona is only a 5-minute walk away. Piazza di Spagna Metro Station can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Suite Castrense
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a bidet. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: Sensation House
description: Located in Rome, near Bologna Metro Station, Tiburtina Metro Station and Roma Tiburtina Train Station, Sensation House has a shared lounge. Free WiFi is featuredthroughout the property. Every unit features a private bathroom and bidet, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. A toaster is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. An Italian breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Sapienza University of Rome is 2 km from Sensation House, while Rome Termini Train Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 24 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Roma Luxus Hotel
description: Roma Luxus Hotel offers free WiFi and stylish rooms in Rome's Monti district. Set 300 metres from the Roman Forum, the property also features a bar and an à la carte restaurant. Rooms at the Luxus Hotel Roma are all spacious and come with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and air conditioning. Each room includes a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. An extensive sweet and savoury international buffet breakfast is available daily. It includes eggs, pancakes, cheese and pastries. The hotel is 400 metres from both Piazza Venezia and Quirinale Palace, while Via Nazionale shopping street can be reached in 1 minute on foot. Rome Ciampino Airport is 15 km away.

name: Hotel Tirreno
address: Via San Martino Ai Monti 18, 00184 Rome
description: Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, peaceful garden and central location in the heart of Rome, Hotel Tirreno is surrounded by great restaurants, 200 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica. The Tirreno is set in a historic building where used to live Il Domenichino, a famous Italian painter. Completely renovated, it offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. A continental breakfast is served each morning and includes pastries and Italian coffee. Drinks from the bar can be enjoyed out in the garden. Guests at the Tirreno Hotel have a tour desk and information point at reception, as well as a free luggage storage room for departure day. The hotel has great metro links on Line A and Line B as it is between the metro stations of Cavour and Vittorio Emanuele. It is a 15-minute walk from the Coliseum and Roman Forum.

name: Hotel Pacific
description: Hotel Pacific boasts 50 years of welcoming tradition and experience in a completely renovated building, close to Saint Peter's Square and the Vatican Museums, elegant neighbourhood in the Eternal City. The Stadio Olimpico football stadium is 3.5 km away. Being a mere 300 meters from Cipro – Musei Vaticani Metro stop (Line A), the Pacific offers fast connection to the most prestigious landmarks of the city, including Villa Borghese, the Spanish Steps, the Trevi Fountain, Via Veneto, the Coliseum, Piazza Navona, Saint John in Lateran and many more. All the comfortable rooms of the Hotel Pacific feature their own private bathroom and double glazing for your utmost quiet. As well, most of the rooms offer either a balcony or a terrace. The welcoming I Velieri restaurant seats about 130 people and serves delicious Italian and Roman cuisine, prepared with care by the resident chef. Discover the pleasures of genuine, good food in a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Hotel Milani
description: Hotel Milani provides spacious, modern rooms with air conditioning and LCD TVs. It is located in a busy area less than a 5-minute walk from Termini Train Station. Housed in an old building, Hotel Milani has been completely refurbished. Guests can relax in the hotel's elegant lobby with marble floors, sofas and flowers, or in the comfortable TV room. There is also a bar and internet point. Hotel Milani offers a range of different room types to suit your needs. All feature satellite channels and showers. Some rooms have a free Wi-Fi internet connection while others include a spa bath. Hotel Milani's staff provide helpful and professional service. Book tours or ask for restaurant reservations at reception. Guests have a discount at a restaurant just 3 minutes' walk away.

name: Relais Giulia
description: Featuring stuccoed walls and an ancient cloister, Relais Giulia offers elegant rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. It is a 5-minute walk from Campo de' Fiori Market and Piazza Navona Square. Designed by Italian architects Christian Rocchi and Danilo Maglio, rooms at the Giulia Relais come with ultra-modern furnishings, luxury fabrics and LCD TVs. They all include a private bathroom. The lively Trastevere district, with its cafés, restaurants and shops, is just a stroll away. The Trevi Fountain and Saint Peter's Square are both a pleasant 10-minute walk from the property.

name: Hotel Milo
description: Hotel Milo provides functionally furnished rooms just 5 minutes' walk from Rome Termini Station. You will have free Wi-Fi access throughout the property, plus great bus, train and Metro links. Milo's rooms are large and come with satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. Some have air conditioning, available at extra charges. A continental sweet and savoury breakfast is served every morning from 07:30- 09:30. At Milo Hotel you are close to shops and typical restaurants. A 20-minute stroll will take you to the Coliseum and Milo's friendly staff can book you tours.

name: Hotel Mozart
description: The 4-star Hotel Mozart offers elegant accommodation in Rome’s centre, just around the corner from the main shopping street, Via Del Corso. It features free Wi-Fi, a restaurant, and a roof garden with views of Rome’s rooftops. Rooms combine classic-style décor and furniture with modern amenities such as an LCD TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Some rooms face the main street, while others overlook the internal courtyard. In the morning, a rich breakfast buffet is available. This includes traditional Italian coffee, along with fruit pies, freshly baked croissants and homemade pastries. A free internet point is available in the hotel’s lobby. Mozart Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Spanish Steps and Spagna Metro Station. In 10 minutes on foot you can reach the Trevi Fountain.

name: Al Manthia Hotel
description: Al Manthia Hotel is right in the heart of Rome just 100 metres from Barberini metro stop and a 5-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain. This charming hotel is set in a historic building that dates back to the late 1800s. It features a cosy lounge and a dining room where a continental buffet breakfast is served each morning. Rooms are air conditioned and feature Wi-Fi access, a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. Al Manthia Hotel is close to the Quirinale Palace and a short stroll from the Spanish Steps. You have excellent access to public transportation, including both bus and metro lines.

name: Grand Hotel Plaza
description: Located 350 metres from the Spanish Steps in Rome, the prestigious Grand Hotel Plaza is set in a restored historical building from 1860. It features 2 panoramic terraces and elegant accommodation with high ceilings and Carrara marble. The Grand Hotel Plaza has preserved many of its original features and impressive Mongiardino interior decor, including the unique Salone delle Feste ballroom. The hotel has also been featured in many famous films. All individually designed rooms and suites come with air conditioning and free WiFi. Each of the suites boasts a spacious terrace with spectacular views over some of the major monuments of Rome, including the Spanish Steps and St. Peter's Basilica. The Carrara marble bathrooms include a Sorelle Fontana courtesy set. Terrazza Accademia di Francia, open all year round, is the ideal setting for a relaxing drink with impressive views of Villa Borghese and the Church of Saint Carlo al Corso’s dome. An American breakfast is served daily in the elegant Salone Mascagni hall, and includes homemade products and pastries. The Sorelle Fontana Restaurant, which features original sketches from famous designers, serves Mediterranean cuisine with seasonal and local ingredients. Grand Hotel Plaza is located on the popular shopping street of Via del Corso, and a 2-minute walk from designer shops along Via dei Condotti.

name: Hotel Patria
description: Located near Piazza della Repubblica, Hotel Patria offers friendly service and a central location in Rome within walking distance of main sites and the Termini Railway Station. Walk to the Repubblica Metro Station in 5 minutes from Hotel Patria. Restaurants, shops and boutiques are all close by. Set in an old building, Hotel Patria provides a 24-hour front desk and a bar. WiFi is free in the reception area. Hotel Patria features comfortable rooms with flat-screen TVs, en suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Hotel staff will assist you with tourist information, sightseeing suggestions and airport transfers (Additional paid service).

name: Superior Relais
description: No description found

name: Hotel Lord Byron
description: Hotel Lord Byron is located in Rome’s classy and elegant Parioli district, just behind the Borghese Gardens. This exclusive hotel offers calm, quiet surroundings, excellent service and beautiful interiors. One of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, the hotel is situated in one of the charming town houses common to this part of Rome. Admire stylish, Art Deco furnishings and enjoy the luxurious rooms and lounges. Via Veneto and the Spanish Steps are a 15-minute walk away from Hotel Lord Byron. Villa Borghese’s attractions, from the zoo to the famous art gallery are even closer. After a day out discovering Rome, spend an evening at peaceful Hotel Lord Byron. Enjoy a few drinks at Il Salotto, the hotel’s lounge bar before moving on to the hotel restaurant. Enjoy award-winning regional cuisine accompanied by excellent Italian and foreign wines.

name: Relais Calamatta
description: No description found

name: Abitart Hotel
description: The design hotel Abitart is situated in the heart of the Ostiense neighbourhood, close to Ostiense Railway and Metro Station, which provides quick access to all of Rome, including Fiumicino Airport. Rooms at the Abitart are elegant and each is inspired to a particular artistic style. All rooms have satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Guests enjoy an extensive American breakfast buffet daily. Eataly Roma, the famous high-end Italian food market chain, is less than 10 minutes' walk away.

name: Palazzo Dama
description: Offering a free outdoor pool and a garden with lemon trees, Palazzo Dama is set 200 metres from Piazza del Popolo and a 10-minute walk from The Spanish Steps. The hotel has a lounge bar, a restaurant and spacious rooms with free Sky channels and parquet floors. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms have a seating area. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries Acqua di Parma and hairdryer. A sweet and savoury continental-style breakfast buffet is available daily. Flaminio Metro is 500 metres from the property, while Villa Borghese park is a 5-minute walk away. Both Ciampino and Fiumicino airports are within a 45-minute drive of Palazzo Dama.

name: Gioberti Art Hotel
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Gioberti Art Hotel offers modern rooms with free WiFi, just 50 metres from Termini Train Station. Guests can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast every morning. All air-conditioned rooms feature bold colours and contemporary décor. They come with a minibar, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. A concierge service and 24-hour front desk are available. Santa Maria Maggiore church is a five-minute walk from the Gioberti. The Rome Opera House is 550 metres away.

name: Comfort Hotel Bolivar
description: The Comfort Hotel Bolivar is situated within walking distance of the Colosseum and popular area attractions, including the Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps and the famous Via Veneto. The hotel is just minutes from the Termini railway station, the easiest way for connections to reach both the Ciampino and the Leonardo da Vinci Fiumicino Airport. Piazza Venezia, a famous city square, is right around the corner. A variety of restaurants and cocktail lounges are located in the surrounding area. Be sure to stop by the American-style bar at the hotel for a drink in the lobby. Guests can enjoy a free full breakfast every morning in a lovely breakfast room with a special view on the historical center. All guest rooms are equipped with new bathrooms, mini-bars, hair dryers, flat TVs, free WiFi, air conditioning and safes. Select rooms also have balconies. Non-smoking and handicap accessible rooms are available upon request. Private guest parking is located on the premises for convenience. This pet-friendly hotel also provides a currency exchange, car rental service and valet cleaning services. The Comfort Hotel Bolivar has a quiet and convenient location, which combined with its superior accommodations, helps make it the perfect place for all travelers to stay and visit the heart of Rome.Choice Hotels

name: Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton, set in the heart of the city. Once a bank headquarters, the hotel has been fully renovated while maintaining the authentic Cipollino marble and charming architecture. Walk to the Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and Villa Borghese, or shop the luxury Italian brands along the Trident streets. There’s a wealth of beautiful sites and museums nearby including the Colosseum, Roman Forum and Vatican Museum. Unwind in a guest room with modern Italian furniture, high ceilings, marble floors, and modern comforts like complimentary WiFi, an interactive TV, Nespresso® machine and walk-in shower. Suites offer a separate living area, bar cabinet and guest bathroom, plus welcome gifts and complimentary services. Choose the Barberini Suite for your own private terrace overlooking the rooftops of Rome. Enjoy gourmet cuisine throughout our restaurants and lounges. Restaurant 1930 serves creative local dishes including a lunch buffet, and Sky Blu on the rooftop has a genuine Italian setting. The Onyx Lobby Lounge and Bar is popular with guests and locals alike – try a signature Aleph cocktail – and our Cognac Lounge is a unique place in the city to enjoy your cigar and spirits. Book indulgent treatments in our spa, and relax in the indoor and rooftop pools. Plan events in stylish spaces that accommodate board meetings up to lavish weddings. Dedicated planners and the latest A/V technology ensure your event is a success. Hilton Honors program available.Hilton

name: Holiday Inn Express Rome - East
description: A 15-minute drive from Rome’s centre, GP Hotel has free parking and a 24-hour bar. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with a satellite LED TV and Wi-Fi is free throughout. Rooms at GP Hotel come with carpeted floors and soundproofing. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe is available at reception. A buffet breakfast of pastries, ham, cheese and boiled eggs is provided daily. Guests can enjoy drinks or snacks at the Café Bar, which is open daily. The area has a number of restaurants serving local cuisine and Roman thin-crust pizza. Palmiro Togliatti Station is 900 metres from the GP Hotel. Ciampino Airport is less than 15 km from the property.

name: Hotel Eden - Dorchester Collection
description: No description found

name: Unaway Hotel Empire Roma
description: With a classy, elegant design, embellished by valuable architectural elements and precious marbles, the UNAWAY Empire Palace Hotel Roma is a refined 4 star superior hotel located in Rome's historical center, just a few steps from the famous Via Veneto. The hotel was built from the charming spaces of the palace erected in 1870 by the Mocenigo, a noble Venetian family, as their own residence. The UNAWAY Empire Palace Hotel Roma welcomes its guests in comfy rooms and suites, tempts their taste buds with its restaurant that reinterprets the best Mediterranean cuisine and cheers them up with a suggestive cocktail bar for drinks and aperitifs and a fine courtyard where to enjoy lunches and dinners or pamper themselves to relaxing moments. Business clients may count on modern meeting rooms with natural light and view on the city roofs that can be modulated according to the different needs.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Giardino D'Europa
description: Located by the exit 21/22 of Rome's GRA orbital road, Hotel Giardino d'Europa offers an outdoor pool, a restaurant and free parking. Rooms come with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. At the Giardino d'Europa the rooms have tiled floors, wooden headboards, and classic furniture. The private bathrooms are complete with a hairdryer and toiletry set. Breakfast is buffet style, with a choice of cold meats, sweet pastries and cereals. The restaurant serves both international dishes and Italian favourites. Ciampino Airport is just 4 km away. The hotel can arrange a shuttle service to Ciampino Airport. A shuttle service to/from Anagnina Metro is offered free of charge from 8:15 until 18:00 at scheduled time.

name: Hotel Des Epoques
description: Featuring elegantly furnished rooms, Hotel Des Epoques is set 700 metres from Rome’s Castro Pretorio Metro. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here come with satellite TV, parquet floors, and an electric kettle. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Policlinico Umberto Primo hospital is 10 minutes’ walk from the Des Epoques. Termini Station is 1.3 km away and can be reached by metro in just 1 stop.

name: Appia Park Hotel
description: The Appia Park Hotel is set on the most important road of antique Rome; the Appian Way was built to connect the capital to Brindisi in Southern Italy. This elegant hotel, surrounded by greenery, is immersed in history and is close to the ancient ruins of the Acqua Felice Aqueduct. The Appia Antica Park and Acqua Santa golf course are also nearby. The Appia Park Hotel offers a high quality service and comfortable guest rooms all featuring private balconies. If you are in Rome on business there are a number of conference rooms available even for large parties. The hotel is conveniently located for those travelling to and from Ciampino airport, just 5 km away. The historic centre of Rome, only 7 km away, is easily reached by public transport.

name: J.K. Place Roma
description: Offering stylish rooms with free WiFi, J.K. Place Roma is situated in the heart of Rome with the Spanish Steps and the Pantheon each a 10-minute walkaway. A breakfast à la carte is included. All the rooms come with air conditioning, free minibar, a satellite flat-screen TV and Bose SoundLink Mini system. Slippers, bathrobes, and free toiletries are supplied in each private bathroom. The interiors are designed by Michele Bonan and feature rosewood canopy and handmade fabric beds. The marble bathrooms are complete with a large glass shower and bidet. The on-site restaurant features Italian and international cuisine with daily fresh produce. Piazza del Popolo is a 10-minute walk from the property, while Termini Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel Emona Aquaeductus
description: Hotel Emona Aquaeductus is a small villa with its own quiet garden set in central Rome, 500 metres from Manzoni Metro Station on line A. Buses for the Vatican and Termini Train Station run from Piazza di Porta Maggiore 50 metres away. Your room has air conditioning, a minibar, and a satellite TV. Bathrooms are in marble, and free Wi-Fi is provided. Some rooms have a spa bath. Emona Aquaeductus Hotel provides free daily newspapers and a laptop in the lobby. Breakfast may be served in the garden. The bar and reception are open 24 hours a day. Staff are multilingual and can assist you with tourist and travel info.

name: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's
description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's is on the historic Via Aurelia Antica, 5 km from the Vatican and very close to the lush Villa Pamphili Park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This Crowne Plaza is surrounded by its private park. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. The spa is free for all guests as well as the 2 tennis courts and the outdoor swimming pool, open during the summer and featuring a pool bar. There is also a free fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Rooms are spacious and come with modern furnishings. The buffet breakfast is American-style. The restaurant is open all day long and serves delicious, Italian cuisine. During summer meals are served on the terrace. There is also a business centre. Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's offers free parking. A scheduled transfer service to/from Rome Fiumicino Airport is arranged on request, at extra costs. Buses stop outside the hotel and there is a taxi station on site.

name: NH Collection Roma Fori Imperiali
description: Stay in one of Rome’s most important archaeological areas when you choose the five-star NH Collection Roma Fori Imperiali. This brand new hotel is on the edge of the historic Imperial Forums site, and guests can enjoy stunning views of the ruins from selected rooms. The hotel is also convenient for Rome’s other major attractions, including the Colosseum and the Vatican, as well as being close to the restaurants and bars of Monti, and Rome’s main shopping areas. The hotel has 42 freshly decorated rooms, including superior rooms, premium rooms, Junior Suite, suites and accessible rooms. They all feature large flat-screen TVs with international channels, free Wi-Fi and coffee machines. A choice of pillows and super-comfortable mattresses assure a good night’s sleep. Guests start the day with eggs, fruit, pastries, cold meats and Italian specialities from the à la carte buffet, while the local pasta dishes and Mediterranean cuisine served in the hotel restaurant takes care of dinner. One of the hotel’s highlights is the beautiful terrace bar. On the top floor, it offers panoramic views of the Imperial Forums, churches and cityscape. Having a cocktail or aperitive here as the sun sets over the city is an experience never to be forgotten.NH Hoteles

name: Loly Boutique Hotel Roma
description: Located in Rome, 500 metres from Piazza di Santa Maria in Trastevere, Loly Boutique Hotel Roma provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.7 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Campo de' Fiori. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Loly Boutique Hotel Roma every room has bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roma Trastevere Train Station, Largo di Torre Argentina and Palazzo Venezia. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 16 km from Loly Boutique Hotel Roma.

name: Hotel Relais dei Papi
description: Just 500 metres from Lepanto Metro Station on line A, Hotel Relais Dei Papi is 5 minutes’ walk from St. Peter's Square and the Vatican Museums. All air-conditioned, rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV. With excellent public transport links, Relais Dei Papi consists of 4 floors, and is 2 metro stops from the Spanish Steps and a 20-minute ride from the Coliseum. Rome's famous Cola di Rienzo shopping street is around the corner, and discounts are available at a garage just 50 metres away. A breakfast buffet including cereals, croissants and fruit juices is served daily in the breakfast room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. You can book an exclusive session at the on-site paid spa. The free gym is open at shceduled times during the day. Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer and toiletry set.

name: Generator Rome
description: Generator Rome is set a 10-minute walk from Termini Central Station and even closer to the Vittorio Emanuele Metro stop. This hostel set over 7 floors of a 19th-century building and provides free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a café and a bar. The Generator Rome is great for visiting Rome as you will have plenty of bus and Metro links. This hostel offers rooms with a private bathroom and dormitory rooms with an internal shared bathroom. The Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore is around the corner and you can walk to the Coliseum from here.

name: Hotel Nazionale
description: Set next to Italian Parliament in the famous pedestrian square of Piazza Montecitorio, Hotel Nazionale offers elegant rooms with a flat-screen TV, and free WiFi throughout. The Pantheon is 350 metres away. All rooms here include air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is prepared daily including cheese, cold cuts, pastries and fresh fruit. Gluten-free options are available on request. Hotel Nazionale is set in a renovated building of the 18th century, within walking distance of the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The imposing Pantheon is just around the corner. Piazza Navona and the Trevi Fountain are both within 500 metres of the property. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: River Chateau Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from the banks of the Tiber River, the 4-star River Chateau Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Ponte Milvio bridge. It offers a free gym and elegant rooms decorated with precious fabrics, marble, and mosaics. These air-conditioned rooms feature a minibar, free wired internet, and a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. A sweet and savoury buffet-style breakfast is served daily in the dining hall. The River Chateau is complete with a bar. Just 1.5 km from the Olympic Stadium, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Auditorium Parco della Musica. Saint Peter’s Square is 5 km away.

name: La Maison Royale
description: Situated in Rome, 1.8 km from the centre and less than 1 km from Castel Sant'Angelo, La Maison Royale features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with bidet in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Popular points of interest near La Maison Royale include St Peter's Square, The Vatican and Lepanto Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Bettoja Hotel Massimo d'Azeglio
description: Since the end of the 19th century, the 4 star Massimo DAzeglio has welcomed guests in a classic setting and has preserved the original Fin de Sicle ambience and style.This handsome heritage building has hosted many illustrious historical figures: the King of Serbia, the WW 1 air force hero Francesco Baracca, Benito Mussolini, General Diaz, Louis Armstrong, Pier Paolo Pasolini, Fausto Coppi, the composer Mascagni. The hotel contains an important collection of original paintings.iHotelier/iStay

name: In Trastevere House
description: No description found

name: Hotel Osimar
description: Located 15 minutes’ walk from Rome’s Tibutina train station and Bologna Metro stop, Hotel Osimar is beautifully modern and offers great transport links into the historic centre. Featuring bright, fresh décor, Hotel Osimar’s interiors are comfortable and elegant. Rooms are well-maintained and come with air conditioning and minibars. Make use of the free internet point in the hall or enjoy a drink outside on the terrace. Buses will take you from nearby Hotel Osimar directly to the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps, making tourism easy.

name: Leon's Place Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa, Leon's Place Hotel In Rome is one of the most exclusive design hotels in Italy's capital city, located a 10-minute walk from Villa Borghese park and the famous Via Veneto. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms offer luxury furnishings and a marble bathroom. Many rooms have a beautiful view of the historic centre. A varied breakfast is served daily. Set in a historic building, Leon’s Place is in Rome’s business district, close to the main embassies and government buildings. Public buses are available in nearby Porta Pia, and provide links to Termini Train Station in about 10 minutes. The hotel features a free fitness centre and the Visionnaire Cafè, where you can enjoy drinks in a glamorous setting.

name: Sotel Nomentana
description: Idea Hotel offers functional rooms with large beds, and a generous breakfast of homemade pastries. Located in a residential area, it is a 30-minute journey from the centre of Rome. WiFi is free throughout. Sotel Nomentana is situated between Via Nomentana and Via Tiburtina. Public buses stop nearby and run to/from Ponte Mammolo Metro Station, on line B. Rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom. Each features classic furnishings and modern-art paintings. At Roma Nomentana Idea Hotel drinks are available at the 24-hour bar and on the veranda. The restaurant serves classic Italian cuisine and Roman specialities. The hotel features a private garage and is in front of a free outdoor public parking.

name: Etruria Relais And Wine
description: No description found

name: Hotel Corona
description: A short walk away from Repubblica Metro Station and Termini Railway Station, this simple 3-star hotel offers a free breakfast, helpful multilingual staff and a central location in Rome. Just around the corner from Rome's Opera House, Hotel Corona is set in an old building on a quiet side street. A small market is close by and you will be within walking distance of main monuments. This no-frills hotel provides an on-site restaurant, an air-conditioned breakfast room, and small lounges. Wi-Fi access is available in the lobby at an additional cost. Hotel Corona has small clean rooms with en suite bathrooms, direct-dial telephones, a safe, a hairdryer, and satellite TV. Friendly staff can arrange city tours and book museum tickets. Ask about scooter, bicycle and car rentals. Air conditioning is centralised and controlled by the front desk.

name: Grand Hotel Palace
description: Located on Rome's Via Veneto opposite the American Embassy, this luxury hotel dates back to the 1920s. With free WiFi throughout, this property offers rooms with designer furnishings, an à la carte restaurant, and a free spa. Villa Borghese is 400 metres away. All air conditioned, rooms at the Grand Hotel Palace include an LCD satellite TV and a minibar. The marble bathroom includes VIP toiletries. Guests can enjoy fine Italian cuisine at the Cadorin Restaurant. Breakfast is an extensive American buffet with sweet and savoury options. After a day out, guests can unwind at the wellness centre which includes a sauna and a hot tub. Massages can be reserved, and a fitness centre is also available. The building, designed by Marcello Piacentini, was stylishly restored by Italo Rota. The Cadorin grand hall, and the ultra-modern business lounge with bar, are ideal for relaxation. The hotel is 5 minutes' walk from Piazza Barberini and Barberini Metro Station, on line A. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Bettoja Hotel Mediterraneo
description: Designed by Art Deco Architect Mario Loreti in 1938, it sits on top of Esquilino Hill, the highest of Romes Seven Hills, offering unparalleled views of Rome. Inspired by the name Mediterraneo, the marine theme can be enjoyed throughout its 50 meters high 10 floors and 242 rooms. With its central location, a few steps from Roma Termini train station, guests staying at Hotel Mediterraneo can walk to all of the most iconic monuments and attractions of the Ethernal City.iHotelier/iStay

name: La Griffe Hotel Roma
description: La Griffe Roma MGallery Collection is in the heart of Rome, within a 5-minute walk of Piazza della Repubblica and Teatro dell'Opera di Roma. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).Hotels.com

name: Boutique Hotel Galatea
description: When in Rome it is important to have good public transport links and a central location that lets you reach the main attractions on foot; therefore Hotel Galatea is ideal. Set on the corner of Via Nazionale you are right in the heart of one of the most popular shopping districts in Rome, a 10-minute walk from Termini Station. Each guest room boasts a modern design and comes with air conditioning. A sweet and savoury continental breakfast is served daily. Ask at reception about guided tours around Rome and airport transfers. The Galatea Hotel is close to the popular neighbourhood of Monti where you can find plenty of typical wine bars and restaurants. The Roman Forum and Coliseum are around 10 minutes away on foot. In addition, you are just a few hundred metres away from metro stops on both city lines; perfect for travelling further afield.

name: W Rome
description: Historic palazzo on the outside, a bold interpretation of luxury inside, W Rome celebrates the Italian attitude and captures the energy of the Eternal City. With its 162 rooms and suites, design twist and vibrant experiences, the hotel marks the W Hotels entry to the scene in an unapologetically Italian way, starting from the taste experiences with Head chef Ciccio Sultano who shakes up the city's foodie scene with authentic Sicilian cooking served at Giano Restaurant. Loaded with Roman vitality yet dismantling the norm, W Rome has something for everyone, whether it be a sweet retreat at Zucchero x Fabrizio Fiorani, a cocktail with upbeat music at W Lounge or live entertainment at Giardino Clandestino. On the upper floor, striking views of the city make Seu Pizza con Vista, in collaboration with Pier Daniele Seu, and WET Deck even more exceptional. Owning the Eternal City mindset, W Rome calls out the past, present and future to remix tradition and defy boundaries.Marriott

name: Hotel City
description: Hotel City Palazzo dei Cardinali offers rooms with Wi-Fi and LCD satellite TV in a great location in Rome's historic centre. The Spanish Steps and the Trevi Fountain are 200 metres away. A buffet breakfast also featuring gluten-free and organic produce is served daily. Vegan products are available upon request. Hotel City Palazzo dei Cardinali is 300 metres away from Spagna Metro Station, on line A. The hotel is surrounded by designer shops and close to great restaurants. City Hotel is family-run and located on the second floor of a historic building.
